titleGen : 2001?($a,$b[0-],$?[0-])[0-],{461$1200,462$1200,463$1200}($v[/0])[0-],000 : if(pos(#3,7,1)!="a") "[indent]" + if(!empty(#2|%1)) if(!empty(#2)) if(!empty(%1)) iser(#2|ser(%1," ; ")," [b]:[/b] ") else #2 fi else ser(%1," ; ") fi fi + ser(for(i=%3: if(name(i)=="d") " [b]=[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") else if(name(i)=="e") " [b]:[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") else if(name(i)=="h") "[b].[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="i") "[b],[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="f") " [b]/[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") fi fi fi fi fi)) + "[/indent]" else "[indent]" + ser(%1," ; ") + ser(for(i=%3: if(name(i)=="d") " [b]=[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") else if(name(i)=="e") " [b]:[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") else if(name(i)=="h") "[b].[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="i") "[b],[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="f") " [b]/[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") fi fi fi fi fi)) + "[/indent]" fi;

dateCode1 : 100($a) : if(up(pos(%1,8,1))=="E") ipx("[b]. —[/b] ",pos(%1,13,4)) + px(" (Репродуцирован в ", pos(%1,9,4)," году)") else if(up(pos(%1,8,1))=="J") ipx("[b]. —[/b] Дата утверждения/ публикации: ",px(pos(digit(pos(%1,9,8)),6,2),".") + px(pos(digit(pos(%1,9,8)),4,2),".") + pos(digit(pos(%1,9,8)),0,4), "года") else ipx("[b]. —[/b] Опубликовано/создано: ",pos(%1,9,4), "году") fi fi;

dateCode : 100($a) : if(up(pos(%1,8,1))=="E") ipx("[b]. —[/b] ",pos(%1,13,4)) else if(up(pos(%1,8,1))=="J") ipx("[b]. —[/b] Дата утверждения/публикации: ",px(pos(digit(pos(%1,9,8)),6,2),".") + px(pos(digit(pos(%1,9,8)),4,2),".") + pos(digit(pos(%1,9,8)),0,4), "года") else ipx("[b]. —[/b] Опубликовано/создано: ",pos(%1,9,4), "году") fi fi;

publishingGen : 205($a,${bdfg}[0-]) : %1[0]+ser(for(i=%2:if(name(i)=="f") " [b]/[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="g") " [b];[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") else if(name(i)=="b") "[b],[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="d") " [b]=[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") fi fi fi fi));

publishingAnl : 464$1205($a,${bdfg}[0-]) : ipx("[b]. —[/b] ",%1[0])+ser(for(i=%2:if(name(i)=="f") " [b]/[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="g") " [b];[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") else if(name(i)=="b") "[b],[/b] "+i else if(name(i)=="d") " [b]=[/b] "+px("[i]",i,"[/i]") fi fi fi fi));

dateGen : {455$1210,210}($d[0-])[0-/0], 100($a), 000 : if(pos(#3,8,1)!="1") if(empty(%1)) if(up(pos(#2,8,1))=="E") ipx(pos(#2,13,4), " г.") + px(" (Репродуцирован в ", pos(#2,9,4)," году) ") else if(up(pos(#2,8,1))=="J") px(pos(digit(pos(#2,9,8)),6,2),".") + px(pos(digit(pos(#2,9,8)),4,2),".") + ipx(pos(digit(pos(#2,9,8)),0,4), " г.") else ipx(pos(#2,9,4), " г.") fi fi else ipx(%1, " г.") fi else "Издается с "+trim(token(%1,"-")[0]," ")+if(!empty(token(%1,"-")[1]))" по "+ trim(token(%1,"-")[1]," ") fi + "г." fi;
outDataGen :: iser(#pubGen," [b];[/b] ")+if(!empty(#pubGen)) ipx("[b],[/b] ",#dateGen) else iser(#dateGen,"[b],[/b] ") fi;
outDataDop :: iser(#pubDop," [b];[/b] ")+if(!empty(#pubDop)) ipx("[b],[/b] ",#dateDop) else iser(#dateDop,"[b],[/b] ") fi;
outDataAnl :: if(!empty(#pubAnl|#dateAnl)) "[b]. —[/b] " ** #pubAnl + if(!empty(#pubAnl)) "[b],[/b] " ** #dateAnl else #dateAnl fi fi;

bibllink :: ipx(trim(iser(iser(iser(iser(iser(iser(trim(#titleGen,". ") | trim(#publishingGen,". "),"[b]. —[/b] ") | trim(#spezific,". "),"[b]. —[/b] ") | trim(#outDataGen,". "),"[b]. —[/b] ") | trim(#physicalGen,". "),"[b]. —[/b] ") | px("[b] ([/b]",#seria,"[b])[/b]"),"[b]. —[/b] ") | #standardNumber,"[b]. —[/b] "),". "),"[b].[/b]");
bibllinkDop :: trim(#titleDop,". ") * ipx("[b]. —[/b] ", trim(iser(iser(trim(#publishingDop,". ") | trim(#outDataDop,". "),"[b]. —[/b] ") | trim(#physicalDop,". "),"[b]. —[/b] "),". "),"[b].[/b]");
bibllinkAnl :: trim(#titleAnl,". ") + trim(#publishingAnl,". ") + trim(#spezificAnl,". ") + trim(#outDataAnl,". ") + trim(#physicalAnl,". ");
